infos.value: There should be a cave just ahead.
Perhaps we should rest there for a while.
Does a river flow nearby, Minwu?
We really should draw some fresh water.
There is a place to draw water down that way, my lord.
Then I will go fetch some. Father, please go ahead to the cave.
Right. But don't take too long.
It's supposed to be around here somewhere...
Yeah, keep looking for the cave. They'll be holed up in there.
I've got a bad feeling about this...
We should make our way back to Father at once.
